languages.text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
每当装备者对敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果时，此效果等级额外提高6级。
此外，目标还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}效果，持续至装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者对敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果时，此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}等级额外提高6级。
此外，目标还会获得灵能抑制效果，持续至装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

每当装备者对敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果时，此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}等级额外提高6级。
此外，目标还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}效果，持续至装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж накладывает на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, этот эффект получает +6 уровней дополнительно.
Также на этого противника действует {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g} до следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж накладывает на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} получает +6 уровней дополнительно.
Также на этого противника действует {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g} до следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

Когда персонаж накладывает на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} получает +6 уровней дополнительно.
Также на этого противника действует {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g} до следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

languages.text:
使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を付与すると、この効果のレベルが+6追加される。
この敵にはさらに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}超能力減衰{/g}効果が与えられる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を与えるたび、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のレベルが6追加される。
この敵にはさらに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、超能力減衰効果が与えられる。

使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を与えるたび、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のレベルが6追加される。
この敵にはさらに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}超能力減衰{/g}効果が与えられる。

languages.text:
Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} a un enemigo, este efecto aumenta +6 niveles adicionales.
Este enemigo también obtiene el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}amortiguación psíquica{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} a un enemigo, este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} aumenta +6 niveles adicionales.
Este enemigo también obtiene el efecto de amortiguación psíquica hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger bei einem Feind {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} verursacht, gewinnt dieser Effekt +6 zusätzliche Stufen.
Dieser Feind erhält außerdem bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Trägers den {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psidämpfer{/g}-Effekt.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger bei einem Feind {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} verursacht, gewinnt dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} +6 zusätzliche Stufen.
Dieser Feind erhält außerdem den Psidämpfer-Effekt bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Trägers.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} à un ennemi, cet effet gagne +6 niveaux supplémentaires.
Cet ennemi bénéficie également de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Affaiblissement psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} à un ennemi, cet effet gagne +6 niveaux supplémentaires.
Cet ennemi bénéficie également de l'effet Affaiblissement Psy jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} à un ennemi, cet effet gagne +6 niveaux supplémentaires.
Cet ennemi bénéficie également de l'effet Affaiblissement Psy jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, bir düşman üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} oluşturduğunda bu etki ilave +6 seviye kazanır.
Bu düşman aynı zamanda {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}ruhsezi körelmesi{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
